text: aur jo log kaaphir the unake gol ke gol jahannum kee taraph haikae jaenge aur yahaan tak kee jab jahannum ke paas pahunchegen to usake daravaaze khol die jaegen aur usake daroga unase poochhenge ki kya tum logon mein ke paigambar tumhaare paas nahin aae the jo tumako tumhaare paravaradigaar kee aayaten padhakar sunaate aur tumako is roz (bad) ke pesh aane se daraate vah log javaab degen ki haan (aae to the) magar (hamane na maana) aur azaab ka hukm kaaphiron ke baare mein poora ho kar rahega
